wikitext.*:
'''Kapalinda''' was the source of the river [[Kelusindi]] in [[Valinor]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name=Kap>{{LT1|Appendix}}, p. 257</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Kapalinda'' is in [[Qenya]], most likely being the word ''kapalinda'' ("spring of water") used as a proper name; ''kapalinda'' being derived from the root [[KAPA]] ("leap, spring").<ref name=Kap/>
